Topic.Title: Just need to play a quest game online

Posts.EditableText: So, I mainly use a chromebook to do my stuff, and I have a quest game that I paid for & want to play but  can't due to how you can't open .exe files on a chromebook. Is there any way I'm able to just upload a .quest file and play it online without posting it publicly? Again, I paid for the game and obviously don't want to distribute.
